title: New ebook packs for January 2015

          ------------------------------------------

TO COMBINE YOUR INDIVIDUAL MONTH 2014 TORRENTS INTO A FULL YEAR 2014 TORRENT:

1 Download this magnet or torrent and then stop it.
2 Stop all of the 2014 monthly torrents, complete and incomplete.
3 In Windows explorer, move the JAN thru DEC RAR files from the monthly 2014 

torrent folders into this ALL of 2014 torrent folder, overwriting.
4 Force a recheck of the new torrent, it should now be greater than 0%
5 Queue it
